name: Baked Pears With Saba
keywords: bosc pear, lemon, saba, dessert, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 bosc pears, peeled, cored and halved
Juice of 2 large lemons, and grated zest of one

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 375 degrees. Toss pears in a bowl with lemon juice. Butter a 10- or 11-inch round or 9-by-13-inch baking dish. Arrange pears in dish. Sprinkle with lemon zest and cinnamon.
Bake about 1 hour, basting every 20 minutes with 1/3 cup saba. Remove from oven. If pan juices are runny, spoon into a saucepan, and cook down until syrupy.
Serve pears warm or cool, with pan juices and remaining saba drizzled over them.
